short_desc: The former Career Development Center (CDC) and the University Advisement Center (UAC) were merged to create Academic Advising and Career Education (AACE).  Two offices integrating into one. Please visit AACE's website.For General Education academic advis.....more
description: The former Career Development Center (CDC) and the University Advisement Center (UAC) were merged to create Academic Advising and Career Education (AACE).  Two offices integrating into one. Please visit AACE's website.For General Education academic advising questions related to the office previously known as the University Advisement Center.If there is a career-related question related to the office previously known as the Career Development Center then this is the office.
